def_en: An umbrella is an object which you use to protect yourself from the rain or hot sun. It consists of a long stick with a folding frame covered in cloth.
Umbrella is used to refer to a single group or description that includes a lot of different organizations or ideas.

def_cn: 保护伞（指保护某个国家或群体的体制或协议）
def_en: Umbrella is used to refer to a system or agreement which protects a country or group of people.
